name: Tiny Adventure (Zanyproject)
description:
It is an interactive novel. Adventure, where you decide how it goes!

 One summer day, you go for a walk in the forest but get lost.

 It is an unusual forest.

 What will you find, and whom will you meet?

 And can you get home?

 Read and choose what to do.

 Discover 10 different endings!

 This is a fully playable demo. The completed game will have 23 endings.

 Check it out in June 2023 if you like this demo!

- it will take from 5 minutes to a couple of hours (depending on how many endings you want to find).

- humorous story.

- no AI, but 10 specially made melodies and 9 drawn locations.

- unlockable gallery.

- bonus: free soundtrack (mp3 files in a separate archive).

 Try it and let me know which ending you got:)
